TextLibrary.Text: While you were wasting time, the Soulless have been hitting shipyards throughout the Empire, stealing ships and modifying them. They're amassing a huge fleet.
While you were wasting time, the Soulless have been hitting shipyards throughout the Empire, stealing ships and modifying them. They're amassing a huge fleet.
Every system from Scorpio to the Gehenna Rim has fallen into chaos. Their next strike will be at Plasmia Prime.
Every system from Scorpio to the Gehenna Rim has fallen into chaos. Their next strike will be at Plasmia Prime.
And we'll be waiting for them?
And we'll be waiting for them?
We will. Rendezvous with me there asap.
We will. Rendezvous with me there asap.
